messages.title: OUR NHS... AT RISK!
messages.content: "We've lived through this mistake for 60 years now... The reality is it [The NHS] hasn't worked - it has made people iller..." - Senior Conservative Dan Hannan, Summer 2009

messages.title: It's Geoff Juby vs the Tories here
messages.content: Change of votes in the General Election 2005: +3.2% [Lib Dem], +2.5% [Cons], -6.8% [Lab]. Labour can't win in Rochester and Strood. Voting for them will just help elect a Conservative MP. Only a vote for Geoff Juby will bring real change for our area.

messages.title: See my contract with the people of Rochester and Strood
messages.content: I will put local people first. I will be there to help, listen to your concerns, and stand up for our community.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Nick Clegg and Vince Cable believe that there should be fair taxes that put money back in your pocket.
Geoff campaigning to protect Local NHS Services.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: Campaign for more jobs for local people
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Geoff will meet regularly with local service providers like the police, health services and residents' groups.

mentions.candidate: Geoff Juby is the owner of Reena Stores in Strood with issues affecting small businesses.
mentions.otherPartyLeaderCandidate: Senior Conservative Dan Hannan, Summer 2009. Labour MP deserting Medway.
mentions.tacticalSituation: Change of votes in the General Election 2005: Labour can't win in Rochester and Strood. Voting for them will just help elect a Conservative MP.

issues.economy: Fairer taxes that put money back in your pocket.
issues.environment: Geoff campaigning to keep Cliffe and the Hoo Peninsula free of development.
issues.health: OUR NHS... AT RISK! Geoff campaigning to protect Local NHS Services.

housing.content: To protect our green areas - especially from developers on the Hoo Peninsula.

leaflet.personalStatement: As your local MP Geoff will put local people first and deliver real change and fairness for our area.

images.caption: Geoff speaks with the owner of Reena Stores in Strood about issues affecting small businesses.
Geoff campaigning to keep Cliffe and the Hoo Peninsula free of development.
Geoff campaigning to protect Local NHS Services.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Liberal Democrat MPs were more highly regarded by their constituents than Conservative or Labour were by theirs - Independent Politics/Home largest UK poll, Autumn 2009.
